comment: IHS 3240 Great Professor! Easy going, chill vibes, and caring. Her class is easy to follow and goes by the rubric. Easy grader.

Mrs. Johnston is the nicest teacher I have had so far in college. She genuinely cares about each and every one of her students. Always there for you to answer any questions or help you out in any way. Pretty easy grader but don't expect to just breeze through the class without doing any work

This is the most laid back KSU 1101 teacher. I had her for an 8 am and I actually didn't mind getting up in the morning for her. She's a great teacher who makes the class enjoyable. Compared to other KSU 1101 teachers, she gives out ZERO work. She assigns reading but you don't have to read. TAKE HER!

Very fair and helpful, she's down to earth and as long as you study the material prior to tests, you will be fine. Just dont go in thinking the class is super easy, you will be surprised when test day arrives.
This teacher has a lot of energy and a good instructor.  She cares about students.  Tests are not as easy as I thought they would be.  Do the work you will get an A
Good teacher very helpful.  She expects everyone to do the work.  This class is not an easy A ..unlike what I was told.

She is super cool and really nice but makes this class harder than it should be. It can be hard and the tests are harder than you think. Try to find another teacher if possible because this class is supposed to be an easy A and with her it wont be.
